meta.description: Generate Spotify playlists based on the songs being played in the current tour, using the Setlist.fm API
meta.keywords: Spotify, Setlist.fm, Playlist generator, Festivals, Music, Concerts
meta.title: Generator | Festwrap

step1.description: Select to create a new playlist or use an existing playlist in your account

createNewPlaylist.description: Use this option to create a new Spotify playlist

privatePlaylist.description: The playlist will be private and only you will be able to see it
privatePlaylist.title: Private playlist

createNewPlaylist.title: Create a new playlist

useExistingPlaylist.description: Use this option to add songs to an existing playlist
useExistingPlaylist.title: Use an existing playlist

step1.title: Choose an option to start

step2.description: Search for the artists you want to add to the playlist

emptyState.description: Start searching for artists to add them to the playlist
